org.apache.flink.python.api.streaming.data

类 PythonSender<IN>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.python.api.streaming.data.PythonSender<IN>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable

    public class PythonSender<IN>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    General-purpose class to write data to memory-mapped files.
    另请参阅:

        public void reset()

      • sendRecord

        public int sendRecord(Object value)
               throws IOException
        Writes a single record to the memory-mapped file. This method does NOT take care of synchronization. The user must guarantee that the file may be written to before calling this method. This method essentially reserves the whole buffer for one record. As such it imposes some performance restrictions and should only be used when absolutely necessary.
        参数:
        value - record to send
        返回:
        size of the written buffer
        抛出:
        IOException

      • hasRemaining

        public boolean hasRemaining(int group)

      • sendBuffer

        public int sendBuffer(Iterator i,
                      int group)
               throws IOException
        Extracts records from an iterator and writes them to the memory-mapped file. This method assumes that all values in the iterator are of the same type. This method does NOT take care of synchronization. The caller must guarantee that the file may be written to before calling this method.
        参数:
        i - iterator containing records
        group - group to which the iterator belongs, most notably used by CoGroup-functions.
        返回:
        size of the written buffer
        抛出:
        IOException
